abstract: Citigroup is in advanced talks to buy Automated Trading Desk, an electronic trading firm, for about $700 million, The Wall Street Journal reported. The report noted that the deal marks the latest push by the banking giant into the trading of stocks by computerized programs rather than by people.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup is in advanced talks to buy Automated Trading Desk, an electronic trading firm, for about $700 million, The Wall Street Journal reported. The report noted that the deal marks the latest push by the banking giant into the trading of stocks by computerized programs rather than by people.

headline.main: Citigroup in Talks to Buy Automated Trading Desk, Report Says
